[i]Reach from Beyond – [/i]Whenever one or more undead creatures you control attack, they each get [+]X/[+]0 until end of turn, where X is the number of other attacking undead creatures. [i](Skeletons, Spirits, Vampires, Wraiths, and Zombies are undead creatures.)[/i]
[i]No Rest for the Wicked – [/i]{1}{B}, {T}: Regenerate another target undead creature you control.
